page.description: Load the contents of an existing Excel 2007 (.xlsx) file.

argument.name: FileName
argument.description: The Excel file to load. File must end in .xlsx extension.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns *[xb:.t.]* if the operation succeeds. Otherwise, returns *[xb:.f.]*.

page.note: The Office::ExcelDocument class is for working with Excel 2007 (.xlsx) files. For Excel 2003 (.xls) files, use [Office::Excel2003Document].
